data.title: 36th Infantry Division 100th Anniversary (Short Version)
data.meta_description: Actor Gary Sinise provides the introduction for the 36th Infantry Division, Texas Army National Guard as the division celebrates its 100th Anniversary on July 18th, 2017.  This is a shortened version of another historical video, which is also uploaded to DVIDS.  The video follows the division through the original muster at Camp Bowie, Texas, and into World War I, World War II, the Texas Army National Guard transformation through the years, the Global War on Terrorism, Defense Support to Civil Authorities and training exercises at home and abroad.  Written approval for music use has been received from the artists and recording companies.
data.text: Actor Gary Sinise provides the introduction for the 36th Infantry Division, Texas Army National Guard as the division celebrates its 100th Anniversary on July 18th, 2017. The video follows the division through the original muster at Camp Bowie, Texas, and into World War I, World War II, the Texas Army National Guard transformation through the years, the Global War on Terrorism, Defense Support to Civil Authorities and training exercises at home and abroad.
